original_title: Wilder than Wild: Fire, Forests, and the Future
overview: Wilder than Wild reveals how fire suppression and climate change have exposed Western forests to large, high intensity wildfires, while greenhouse gases released from these fires contribute to global warming. This vicious cycle jeopardizes our forests and affects us all with extreme weather and more wildfires, some of which are now entering highly populated wildland-urban areas.
title: Wilder than Wild: Fire, Forests, and the Future
